name: #TeamSeas (Derin)
description:
My first fully-completed game project. Don't expect much though, you can complete the game in 30 seconds :D

For my first project I wanted to do something valuable, so I made a game about saving the ocean.

Even if completing this game won't do much to enviroment, you can still donate to TeamSeas if you want to help them save the ocean.

https://teamseas.org/

(Disclaimer: I am not affiliated with TeamSeas campaign, I'm just a humble developer who wants to help spreading the word.)

Thanks to nurullahcbci for helping me on UI.
